SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEMT
AND ITEM_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{itemCategory} || '%'
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ITEM_PRICE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ITEM_ORDERDETAIL LIKE '%' || #{itemOrderdetail} || '%'
AND ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_EA, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_METHOD, ITEM_CATEGORY, SELLER_ID, ITEM_ORDERDETAIL, ITEM_STAR, ITEM_PIC, TO_CHAR(ITEM_DATE, 'RR/MM/DD') ITEM_DATE, ITEM_CONDITION, ITEM_LIKE FROM ITEMT
AND SELLER_ID LIKE '%' || #{sellerId} || '%'
AND ITEM_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{itemCategory} || '%'
AND ITEM_ORDERDETAIL LIKE '%' || #{itemOrderdetail} || '%'
AND ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ITEM_PRICE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_EA, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_METHOD, ITEM_CATEGORY, SELLER_ID, ITEM_ORDERDETAIL, ITEM_STAR, ITEM_PIC, TO_CHAR(ITEM_DATE, 'RR/MM/DD') ITEM_DATE, ITEM_CONDITION, ITEM_LIKE FROM ITEMT WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
select count(*) from ORDERT o, ITEMT i where o.item_id = i.item_id and o.item_id = #{itemId} and o.order_condition = '거래완료'

SELECT ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_EA, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_METHOD, ITEM_CATEGORY, SELLER_ID, ITEM_ORDERDETAIL, ITEM_STAR, ITEM_PIC, TO_CHAR(ITEM_DATE, 'RR/MM/DD') ITEM_DATE, ITEM_CONDITION, ITEM_LIKE FROM ITEMT WHERE SELLER_ID = #{sellerId} ORDER BY ITEM_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMT ( ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_EA, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_METHOD, ITEM_CATEGORY, SELLER_ID, ITEM_ORDERDETAIL, ITEM_CONDITION, ITEM_PIC ) VALUES ( seq_item.nextval, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemEa}, #{itemContent}, #{itemMethod}, #{itemCategory}, #{sellerId}, '구매가능', #{itemCondition}, #{itemPic} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEMT SET ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, ITEM_PRICE = #{itemPrice}, ITEM_EA = #{itemEa}, ITEM_CONTENT = #{itemContent}, ITEM_METHOD = #{itemMethod}, ITEM_CATEGORY = #{itemCategory}, ITEM_ORDERDETAIL = #{itemOrderdetail}, ITEM_CONDITION = #{itemCondition} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
